{"id":1106095486,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1700922743,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1106095486/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Words Containing Character","memory":"28.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> findWordsContaining(vector<string>& words, char x) {\n        vector<int> ans;\n        int n=words.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {\n            if(words[i].find(x)==string::npos) continue;\n            else ans.emplace_back(i);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-words-containing-character","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
